componentInstanceProperties.name: masterConfig
componentInstanceProperties.value: {"data":{"dataFormat":"HierarchyJSON","dataSourceMethod":"c.returnHierarchyTop","dataUpdateMethod":"c.returnHierarchyUpdate","queryJSON":{"rootIdRelatedSOQL":"select Manager.id from User where id = :recordId LIMIT 1","relatedQueryObject":"Manager","initialLevelsToRetrieve":2,"chartType":"Hierarchy","objectLevels":[{"terminal":false,"recursive":true,"fields":[{"api":"SmallPhotoUrl","role":"none","display":true},{"api":"name","lookupIdField":"id","role":"name","display":true},{"api":"Manager.Name","parentObjectType":"User","lookupIdField":"managerid","role":"none","display":true},{"api":"id","role":"id","display":false},{"api":"managerid","role":"parentId","display":false},{"api":"Title","role":"none","display":true},{"api":"CreatedDate","role":"none","display":true},{"api":"Email","role":"none","display":true},{"api":"Phone","role":"none","display":true},{"api":"AboutMe","role":"none","display":true}],"objectType":"User"}]},"primaryNodeInitialization":"None"},"panels":{"InfoPanel":{"showOnTop":true,"allowPopover":true,"objectIcons":{"User":"standard:user"}},"ControlPanel":{"showBanner":false,"buttonParameters":{"showtestbuttons":true,"levels":5,"levelsIncreaseOnly":true,"autoIncreaseLevels":true}},"ChartPanel":{"Title":"","showLevelsInitial":1,"Hierarchy":{"showZoomSlider":false,"clearHighlightedPaths":true},"Network":{"showPathToolTip":true,"nodestrokewidth":"0.5px"}}},"search":{"searchAction":"HighlightOpenPath","configuredAllowSearch":true}}
